Question: QUOSS CO., LTD CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
QUOSS CO., LTD

CES 2024

- Introducing new smart home water management system
- Features advanced leak detection technology
- Offers real-time monitoring and control via smartphone app
- Compatible with popular smart home platforms
- Provides detailed water usage analytics
- Easy installation and integration with existing plumbing systems
Summary_cn:
QUOSS有限公司

CES 2024

- 推出全新智能家居水管理系统
- 具备先进的泄漏检测技术
- 通过智能手机应用实现实时监控和控制
- 兼容流行的智能家居平台
- 提供详细的用水分析数据
- 安装简便，可与现有的水管系统无缝衔接
